statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 0 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_revenue > 100000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY profit ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000 AND expenses < 5000;
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, AVG(profit) AS avg_profit FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 5000 GROUP BY company_name HAVING avg_profit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, amount, date, category FROM financial_data ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend = 'Up' AND sentiment = 'Positive';
SELECT id, date, indicator FROM market_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, category, amount, date FROM financial_data ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, amount, category FROM financial_data WHERE category='Investment' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, trend, indicator, date FROM market_trends WHERE sentiment='Positive' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, trend, sentiment FROM market_trends WHERE indicator='Stocks' OR indicator='Cryptocurrency' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, trend, date, sentiment FROM market_trends WHERE sentiment IS NULL ORDER BY trend ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT trend FROM market_trends WHERE trend LIKE '%bullish%' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(profit) AS total_profit FROM financial_data;
SELECT date, revenue - expenses AS net_income FROM financial_data ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, trend FROM market_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue, AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM financial_data;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT description, amount, id FROM historical_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_trends ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT date, trend_name FROM financial_trends WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_description FROM opportunities WHERE opportunity_name LIKE '%growth%';
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM historical_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT trend_name, trend_score FROM financial_trends ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_description FROM opportunities WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT prediction_type, prediction_value FROM predictions WHERE prediction_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5 ORDER BY prediction_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_description, potential_profit FROM opportunities WHERE potential_profit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_value FROM predictions WHERE predicted_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT opportunity_description, potential_profit FROM opportunities WHERE potential_profit > 10000 ORDER BY potential_profit DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_value FROM predictions WHERE predicted_value < 50 AND prediction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM analysis WHERE analysis_description LIKE '%trends%' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
